Package item

Class ItemController

java.lang.Object
item.ItemController
public class ItemController extends Object
Provides functions to edit the properties of a menu item, including its item ID, price, and category.
Author:
FDAA Grp 5

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ItemController(Item item)
    Constructs an ItemEditor associated with a specific Item.

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemController

      public ItemController(Item item)
      Constructs an ItemEditor associated with a specific Item.
      Parameters:
      item - the menu Item to be edited

  • Method Details

    • editId

      public boolean editId(String itemId)
      Edits the item ID of the associated item.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the new item ID to set for the item
      Returns:
      true if the item ID was changed successfully, false if the new ID is the same as the current ID or if the item is null.

    • editPrice

      public boolean editPrice(double price)
      Edits the price of the associated item.
      Parameters:
      price - the new price to set for the item
      Returns:
      true if the price was changed successfully, false if the new price is the same as the current price or if the item is null.

    • editCategory

      public boolean editCategory(Category category)
      Edits the category of the associated item.
      Parameters:
      category - the new category to set for the item
      Returns:
      true if the category was changed successfully, false if the new category is the same as the current category or if the item is null.
